keyword: how many calories in a rib
title: How Many Calories in a Rib?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a rib, including full nutrition breakdown for one pork spare rib, protein, fat details, and preparation tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in a Rib?
assumptions: One bone-in pork spare rib, barbecued, ~85g edible meat portion, with basic sauce.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut (spare vs. baby back), cooking method, sauce, and portion size. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One barbecued pork rib provides ~250 kcal and ~18 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Beef short rib instead of pork

faqs.q: How many calories in a pork rib?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal for one barbecued pork spare rib.

faqs.q: What is the protein in one rib?

faqs.a: Yes, ~20 g total fat per rib, mostly from marbling and cooking.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in a rib?
faqs.a: Grilling or baking is lower than deep-frying; sauces add 50+ kcal.

faqs.q: Calories in a baby back rib vs. spare rib?
faqs.a: Baby back ribs are leaner at ~200 kcal per rib; spare ribs ~250 kcal.
